text: Gómez Suárez of Figueroa, renowned like Inca Garcilaso of the Vega from 1563 (Cuzco, Government of New Castilla, 12 April 1539 - Córdoba, Spain, 23 April 1616), went a writer and historian of Hispanic ancestry-incaica been born in the current territory of the Peru. Category:1539 births Category:1616 deaths Category:Peruvian writers Category:Spanish historians
title: Inca Garcilaso de la Vega
